summary:
## Metals: A Shiny, Strong Material

Metals are shiny, strong materials that conduct electricity and heat well. They can be stretched into wires or hammered into sheets. Examples include iron, gold, and copper. Metals are used to build bridges, buildings, and many other things. Some metals are precious, like gold and silver, and are used for money or jewelry.  Stainless steel, an alloy made from several metals, is very strong and used in many everyday items.
title: Metal
